Hi,

rk

visualization aspects.

 same code runs 250%

d framework for loading time series patterns from a

te rough and undocumented but it allows you to simply edit

file and present patterns to do time-series prediction
using

ink it is also quite fast and I have some plans that I

n in my next message that could significantly speed it

V file. So you can load the times series as a graph in

ize the results of your networks prediction compared

me series.
